name: tangly
content:
tangly adjective
(UNTIDY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in an untidy or badly organized state in which things or parts are not kept separate from each other: The young trees grow through all sorts of tangly grass and undergrowth. My hair always looks great for about an hour and then goes back to the tangly, frizzy, horrible look.
More examplesFewer examplesI don't think she'll need any conditioner because her hair isn't tangly. It took a long time to sort out the tangly mass of wires.
